title: Analyze Product Arbitrage Opportunity
description: A trader analyzes price differences for diesel between the US Gulf Coast and Europe to see if an arbitrage opportunity exists.

tasks.description: Get the current spot prices for diesel in the US Gulf Coast and ARA (Amsterdam-Rotterdam-Antwerp).
tasks.expected_outcome: Current prices for both locations are retrieved.

tasks.description: Calculate the price spread (arb) between the two markets.
tasks.expected_outcome: The price spread is calculated, showing a positive value for shipping from USGC to ARA.

tasks.description: Estimate the transportation costs (shipping freight) and other logistics costs. Compare with the arb to determine profitability.
tasks.expected_outcome: The analysis shows the price spread is greater than the costs, indicating a profitable arbitrage opportunity.
